text.en: Samantabhadra in the pure expanse of the dharmadhātu,
Peaceful and wrathful deities in the sambhogakāya realm,
text.en-trans: longchö dzok kü zhing na zhitrö lha

text.en: Lord Jalü in the devoted perception of disciples to be trained—
text.en-trans: gang dul duljé mö ngor jalü jé

text.en: To the great inseparability of them all, I pray.
Bless me, so that I may conquer all obstacles in this life,
text.en-trans: tsé dir barché chok lé namgyal zhing

text.en: And in future find relief from the terrors Yama brings
text.en-trans: chima shinjé jik lé ukyung té

text.en: And travel to a realm of purity.
text.en-trans: dakpé zhing du dröpar jingyi lob
